item.title: The Federal Government Must Prosecute Activists Who Harbor Illegal Immigrants In Cities Like L.A.
item.description: CA officials openly refuse to work with ICE, making it nearly impossible for the federal government to enforce immigration laws.

item.title: If We Want To Fix Our Broken Culture, We Need More Husbands And Fathers Like Scottie Scheffler
item.description: It’s not every day we see men taking their roles as husbands and fathers seriously, especially in professional sports. Yet, it should be.
